short_summary: This solicitation of offers cancels and supersedes previous solicitation of offers number H4005-235061- Doc4554745247 dated May 2, 2024 with a closing of May 23, 2024 at 2:00PM PST.
description: Health Canada has a requirement for one Direct Analysis in Real Time Mass Spectrometry (DART-MS) Ion Sources to be supplied, delivered, installed, and training provided at the Vancouver Drug Analysis Service (DAS) Laboratory in Burnaby, British Columbia with an option for up to two additional unit by March 31, 2026.
full_summary:
# Solicitation Details

## Solicitation Title
H4005-235061 - DART-MS Installation Solicitation C

## Solicitation Reference Number
WS4310926999-Doc4603360241

## Amendment Number
1

## Solicitation Status
This solicitation is now expired.

## Key Dates
- **Publication Date**: 2024-05-28
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-06-27T14:00:00
- **Amendment Date**: 2024-06-19

## Expected Contract Period
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: Please refer to the solicitation document for details.
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-03-28

## Procurement Details
- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: The award will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Trade Agreements
This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Deliveries
The contractor is required to deliver the goods and services in the following regions:
- British Columbia
- Quebec (except National Capital Region)
- Ontario (except National Capital Region)

## Contracting Entity and End-User Entity
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End-User Entity**: Department of Health (HC)

## Contact Information
- **Contact Name**: Kenny Seeto (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Contact Email**: [kenny.seeto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kenny.seeto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Notice and Attachments
Please refer to the following notice for details:
- [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19845416?extsite=MTk4NDU0MTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19845416?extsite=MTk4NDU0MTZf
